sentences.english: We added federal air marshals to flights entering and leaving the United States.
sentences.chinese: 我们增加了出入美国国境航班上的联邦空警。

sentences.english: Many of the girls arriving at the border had been raped, witnesses said.
sentences.chinese: 目击者说，很多到了国境线的女孩子都遭到过侮辱。

sentences.english: Illegal immigrants are sent back across the border if they are caught.
sentences.chinese: 非法移民一经抓住即被送出国境。

sentences.english: Internet security is as important to our national security as the border patrol.
sentences.chinese: 保障网络安全就像保护国境的安全巡逻一样重要。

sentences.english: We will be across the frontier by midnight.
sentences.chinese: 半夜前我们将穿过国境线。

sentences.english: The valley extends from the Salton Sea on the north to the Mexican border on the south.
sentences.chinese: 萨尔顿海延伸到南面的墨西哥国境。

sentences.english: Frontier Classics resurrect long out-of-print gems of frontier history.
sentences.chinese: 边疆国境的历史经典复活长外的印刷宝石。

sentences.english: Those men were scheming to cheat the government by bringing the jewels into the country without paying duty.
sentences.chinese: 那些人不缴关税将珠宝带入国境，图谋以此诓骗政府。

sentences.english: And althoughpoliceareconstrained by national borders, criminals roam freely.
sentences.chinese: 警察限于国境之内，罪犯却能逍遥自在四处漫游。

sentences.english: Regional collaborations can also boost HE beyond the borders on a single country.
sentences.chinese: 地区合作还能跨越一个国家的国境推动高等教育。

sentences.english: The Frontier Sanitation and Quarantine Law of the P. C. C.
sentences.chinese: 中华人民共和国国境卫生检疫法。

sentences.english: In the south lies the United States with a 8892 kilometers frontier.
sentences.chinese: 南部与美国接壤，国境线长达8892公里。

sentences.english: This practice is prevalent for smugglers crossing territorial borders.
sentences.chinese: 这种实际运用流行于穿越国境的走私犯。

sentences.english: Liberalize the cross-border movement of merchandises and resources.
sentences.chinese: 对穿越国境的商品和资源流动放宽限制。

sentences.english: After all, 95% of the world’s consumers live outside our borders.
sentences.chinese: 毕竟，全球95%的消费者生活在我们的国境之外。

sentences.english: In the spring of 1944, each regiment created a training battalion.
sentences.chinese: 1944年春，每个国境守备团开始增设一个训练营。

definition: to cross a border (usually illegally)/to sneak in or out of a country
border between countries/line forming the border
Shikoku (one of the four main islands of Japan)
